extendedInfo.description: Companion for Dota 2 is the perfect guide for Valveâs Dota 2 players.Presenting a constantly updated database with heroes and items from the famous game, Companion for Dota 2 offers a helping hand to inexperient and experienced gamers alike. Itâs a great opportunity for Dota 2 fans to enhance their gaming experience, with full description of every hero, skill and item of the game, complete with popular character builds, search filters to find exactly the hero or item you are looking for and live news from the official Dota 2 Blog and Dota 2 Steam updates. Features: - Constantly updated database with heroes, items and hero builds; - Search for the ideal hero by their name or using filters like role, faction, primary attribute and attack type; - Full hero stats, complete with a level slider to see how heroes evolve as they gain levels, including progression for attributes, damage, attack speed and armor; - Every hero has its own bio and detailed skill information; - The ad-supported lite version has one popular build for each hero with intuitive guides for skill progression and items for different points in the match; - List of every Dota 2 item and upgrade trees, searchable by detailed filters for the items' attributes.For more information and support, please access http://companionfordota2.decadium.com - Get in touch to tell us what features you would like to see next! Legal Disclaimer: THIS GUIDE IS NOT CREATED, SPONSORED OR ENDORSED BY VALVE CORP. This guide is not an official guide or connected to the game's developer or publisher. All in-game descriptions, characters, locations, imagery and videos of game content are copyright and or trademarked to their respective owners and usage for this game guide falls within fair use guidelines. This guide is intended purely for the love of the game and aid further skill development and exploration of the game.

reviews.title: Great
reviews.comment: \342\230\205\342\230\205\342\230\205\342\230\205\342\230\206   For being free, it really helps you save time, seeing HOW you need to find th dota 2 website. This app only shows you heroes and items unfortunately. I really wish this app offered hero builds in the full version. It also needs a search bar in the menus because it is difficult to find where the ITEM or HERO may be. Very nice though!
reviews.author: Scott Schaefer

reviews.title: Great App but needs ....
reviews.comment: This the most awesome app for beginner\'s understanding .....but....needs three major tweaks .....try to update or atleast reply to my requests .....thanx in advance .... 1) whether ability is active or passive 2)hero strengths and weakness\'  3)hero counters and best against

reviews.title: Great app!
reviews.comment: Really looks like an incredible app! Cannot wait to start using it... A few things... 1) Heroes > When selecting a hero Role, allow the user to define a hero search with more than 1 parameter (at times I can select Carry and it will load the carry heroes in the background so that I may define the search a bit more and then after that it will load the search and close the drop down menu - making it annoying to search for a specific role)... Still an excellent feature though!  2) If you could make the search a bit more, unique? Ie: I want to find Treant so I type in \"tree\" to quick search (maybe relate old Dota hero names to searching for Dota 2 heroes - not sure if that infringes on Copy Write Law?)  3) After typing in text to search for a hero, pressing the \'Back\' button takes me back to the loading menu, please patch to load previous window.  4) Opening the guide to a hero (in my case Dark Seer) > opening the \'Builds\' menu > Tapping on an item (it opens up a window on top, I feel it would be better to open the window underneath the item as part of the page).  Hope this feedback helps...  I look forward to making full use of the app! :D <3
reviews.author: Marcus Huxtable
